ZLMediaKit /

      ZLMediaKit---WebRTC/RTSP/RTMP/HTTP/HLS/HTTP-FLV/WebSocket-FLV/HTTP-TS/HTTP-fMP4/WebSocket-TS/WebSocket-fMP4/GB28181/SRT server and client framework based on C++11

nashsu /

      FreeAskInternet---FreeAskInternet is a completely free, PRIVATE and LOCALLY running search aggregator & answer generate using MULTI LLMs, without GPU needed. The user can ask a question and the system will make a multi engine search and combine the search result to LLM and generate the answer based on search results. It's all FREE to use.

      alloy---OpenTelemetry Collector distribution with programmable pipelines

barry-far /

vinta /

lobehub /

      lobe-chat---🤯 Lobe Chat - an open-source, modern-design LLMs/AI chat framework. Supports Multi AI Providers( OpenAI / Claude 3 / Gemini / Perplexity / Bedrock / Azure / Mistral / Ollama ), Multi-Modals (Vision/TTS) and plugin system. One-click FREE deployment of your private ChatGPT chat application.

BradyFU /

      Awesome-Multimodal-Large-Language-Models---✨✨Latest Papers and Datasets on Multimodal Large Language Models, and Their Evaluation.

IDEA-Research /

      GroundingDINO---Official implementation of the paper "Grounding DINO: Marrying DINO with Grounded Pre-Training for Open-Set Object Detection"

1Panel-dev /

      MaxKB---💬 基于 LLM 大语言模型的知识库问答系统。开箱即用，支持快速嵌入到第三方业务系统，1Panel 官方出品。

langgenius /

      dify---Dify is an open-source LLM app development platform. Dify's intuitive interface combines AI workflow, RAG pipeline, agent capabilities, model management, observability features and more, letting you quickly go from prototype to production.

TheAlgorithms /

      Python---All Algorithms implemented in Python
